resources:
M4TH 1N M0T10N M4TH 1N M0T10N 8-Puzzle Algebra in Action Instructions Settings 8-Puzzle Algebra in Action test Hello world! Instructions Time: Moves: Undo Reset The objective of the game is to rearrange the tiles such that they are arranged 1 through 8 as shown below: In order to play; move the phone in the direction in which you want to move the tile into the blank space. For example, in the situation shown below, Move the ‘2 tile’ up by moving the phone up. The beginning of every motion must be done in a strong but swift motion immediately followed by a return to center. After each move, you must wait at center for 2 seconds before continuing. If stuck, for a hint move the phone up and down in the z-direction. To undo a move, press the undo button. In addition to the motion input, we have also added in the option to interface with the game by swiping on each of the tiles. This maintains the cognitive load of our, but decreases the physical requirements out of the user. This input option can be by accessing the Settings page from the 8-Puzzle gameplay screen. 8-Puzzle Settings Gameplay Options Input Type AIA_Settings Select Difficulty Easy Medium Hard Enter Your Answer Tap Here to Submit Correct! Tap for Next Level Incorrect :( Try Again Your Answer Below
The objective of the game is to solve the provided algebra problems within the allotted time by using either motion or the touch screen interface. To answer the question, input numbers based on the motions depicted below: After you have inputted the desired number, press the submit button. If your answer is correct you will move on to the next level, otherwise you will need to re-enter a new solution until correct. In addition, you may also press the numbers on the provided keypad to answer.
1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 0 Backspace >>>>>>> UI-AIA
